name: DeepSea (itch)
description:
Hey,

this is our game for the #WeeklyGameJam 34.

Instructions:

- You have 30 Seconds to catch all the fish by pressing 'Space'

- You need to bring the fish to the chest at the pier

- The fish from the chest will be sold and you can buy new upgrades.

->Be carefull not to stay too long in one area, otherwise there will be no fish anymore!

Credits:

Music:    Dallas
2D Art:   Aishteru
Programming:    dasPanjo

Thank you for playing!
